text: powers and duties of towns water and or sewer utility districts definitions amend rsa to read as follows definition in this subdivision water and or sewer utility means an entity established for the acquisition operation and management of sewage disposal systems as defined in and other water and sewer infrastructure new paragraphs criteria for stormwater utilities amend rsa by inserting after paragraph vi the following new paragraphs municipalities may incorporate sewage disposal systems as defined in as part of their stormwater utility if not already included in their sewer utility all plans or proposals submitted by a stormwater utility to the legislative body of a municipality for approval shall include at least one estimate of the costs of the plan prepared by a professional entity engaged in stormwater mitigation or sewage treatment and disposal
